DataCash.PaymentNotAssociatedOrderGroup: Payment must be associated with an order group.
DataCash.PaymentNotAssociatedOrderForm: Payment must be associated with an order form.
DataCash.NotEnoughStockWarning: Payment completed but not enough stock. Please contact administrators.
DataCash.CartValidationWarning: An error occurred when processing cart.
DataCash.CreditCardEmpty: Please fill in the payment details.
DataCash.CommitTranErrorCartNull: Cart is null while processing successful transaction redirected back from DataCash
DataCash.PaymentRejectedBy3rdMan: Payment request was rejected by 3rdMan service.
DataCash.GenericError: An error has occurred during checkout with DataCash. Please check your information.
